description:
11.229 sharpen_npp
Use the NVIDIA Performance Primitives (libnpp) to perform image sharpening with
border control.

The following additional options are accepted:

border_type.description: Type of sampling to be used at frame borders. One of the following: replicate

name: sharpen_npp

parameters.description:
Type of sampling to be used ad frame borders. One of the following:

replicate

Replicate pixel values.
parameters.name: border_type

source:
11.229 sharpen_npp

Use the NVIDIA Performance Primitives (libnpp) to perform image sharpening with border control.

The following additional options are accepted:

border_type

Type of sampling to be used ad frame borders. One of the following:

replicate

Replicate pixel values.
